panels.description: Real-time cost burn rate showing how fast spending is accumulating.
panels.title: Real-Time Cost Burn Rate

panels.description: Total cost accumulated over the selected time range.
panels.title: Total Cost (Range)

panels.description: Estimated cost of cache write tokens in the last 24h. Assumes Claude Sonnet pricing: $3.75 per million cache write tokens.
panels.title: Cache Write Cost (24h)

panels.description: Estimated cost of regular input tokens in the last 24h. Assumes Claude Sonnet pricing: $3 per million input tokens.
panels.title: Regular Input Cost (24h)

panels.description: Percentage of code edit suggestions that were accepted in the last 24 hours.
panels.title: Code Edit Acceptance Rate %

panels.description: Projected daily and monthly cost based on current 24h spending rate.
panels.title: Cost Forecast

panels.description: Average cost per session in the last 24 hours.
panels.title: Average Cost / Session

panels.description: Cost efficiency measured as dollars per 1,000 tokens over the last 24 hours.
panels.title: Cost per 1K Tokens

panels.description: Total active coding time in the last 24 hours, displayed in minutes.
panels.title: Active Time (24h)

panels.description: Distribution of token usage across different models in the last 24 hours.
panels.title: Token Distribution by Model (24h)

panels.description: Number of Claude Code sessions started in the last 24 hours, with 7-day average for comparison.
panels.title: Active Sessions (24h)

panels.description: Average cost, token usage, and duration per session over the last 24 hours.
panels.title: Average Session Metrics

panels.description: Lines of code added and removed: today vs 7-day daily average.
panels.title: Lines of Code Modified

panels.description: Percentage of tokens served from cache vs fresh input. Higher cache hit rate means better cost efficiency.
panels.title: Cache Hit Rate %

panels.description: Total tokens consumed in the last 24 hours, with 7-day daily average for comparison.
panels.title: Total Tokens Today

panels.description: Token efficiency by model â€” how many tokens you get per dollar spent.
panels.title: Model Token Efficiency (tokens/$)

panels.description: Tool usage breakdown as a pie chart, showing relative frequency of each tool.
panels.title: Tool Usage Breakdown (Pie)

panels.description: Cost burn rate over time to identify peak spending hours.
panels.title: Peak Cost Hours

panels.description: Total token usage over the last 7 days, with previous week comparison.
panels.title: Weekly Total Token Usage

panels.description: Cost deviation from rolling 24h average. Values above 100% indicate spending above the norm.
panels.title: Cost Anomaly Detection

panels.description: Number of user prompts per hour over time.
panels.title: Prompts Per Hour

panels.description: Distribution of tool decisions by source (user, auto, etc.) over the last 24 hours.
panels.title: Tool Decision Sources (24h)

panels.description: Rate of code modifications in lines per minute, broken down by type (added/removed).
panels.title: Code Modification Velocity (lines/min)

panels.description: Aggregate token consumption rate over time.
panels.title: Token Usage Rate

panels.description: Distribution of prompt lengths from user prompt events.
panels.title: Prompt Length Distribution (chars)
